mage.Core
Class Mistarget

java.lang.Object
  mage.Core.Mistarget

public class Mistarget
extends java.lang.Object

Mistarget Class A mistarget represents a phyiscal alignment match between two oligos (Like the edge of a graph) Mistargets are defined by the results of a BLAST // * @author Samir Ahmed

refresh

public void refresh()
             throws java.lang.Exception
Recalculates the overlap of the mistarget with the selected optimized oligos. Therefore if there is no overlap,

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

isValid

public boolean isValid(Oligo oligo)
                throws java.lang.Exception
isValid will checks the position of the mistarget on the oligo and returns true if any part of the mistarget is found on the span

Parameters:
oligo - The span associated with the mistarget
start_position - The start position of the oligo on the span
end_position - The end position of the oligo on the span
Returns:
Returns true of the mistarget is still on the span, false if the mistarget is not on the span
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - In the event that you passed an oligo that is not associated with this mistarget, then the oligo is removed

getRawScore

public java.lang.Double getRawScore()
Returns the raw score of the blast result as defined by the Switches.Blast.score method

Returns:
Double containing the raw score of Blast Result

getSequence

public java.lang.String getSequence()
Returns the sequence of basepairs for which the two oligos match

Returns:
String of basepairs w/possible gaps
